summary: A mixin that equips animation diffusion pipelines with the FreeNoise technique, offering controls to activate or deactivate free noise, manage its application across model blocks, and support splitâ€‘inference execution for attention, motion, resnet, and sampler components while handling prompt encoding and latent preparation.
